name: The Last Day (itch) (GaelTP, Mike3 117, LuisMesa, medicen420)
name_original: The Last Day (itch) (GaelTP, Mike3 117, LuisMesa, medicen420)
description:
It is the last day of the last video store, the video store of your life, where you have worked for more than 20 years, where you have rented and / or bought your favorite movies and video games. 

Delve into the life of said worker while you remember those beautiful moments.

Game for Global Game Jam 2021.
THIS GAME IS NOT FINSHED YET, but you can ENJOY it.

Credits: 

Gael Treviño - Programacion

Martín Clair - Modelado
